description:
Battles unfold on seven stages where giant bosses await. Fight the mysterious organic entity the ""Thing"" using four unique Stormbringers that can transform into ultimate weapons using the Psychic Storm Phenomenon. An exhilarating shooter game that can be played co-op!

SOUND AND VISUAL MODES INCLUDED
Experience the iconic cutscenes and music that are synonymous with Telenet titles, whenever you want! This collection includes convenient features like save/load anywhere, rewind, and other quality of life upgrades.
name: PSYCHIC STORM
